transcript.content: Good afternoon. LAMA GP surgery. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I need help with throat irritation.
Can you confirm your name and date of birth for identity verification?
My name is Tony Browning and I was born on September 15, 1977.
Thank you, Tony Browning. I've located your records. How long have you been experiencing throat irritation?
It's been a few days now.
Let me arrange an appointment to address your throat irritation. Would you prefer today or tomorrow?
Tomorrow would work better for me.
Great, I have a 10 AM slot with Dr. Patel tomorrow. Does that work for you?
You're now booked with Dr. Patel at 10 AM tomorrow. See you then!
